role.name: /RESET
role.descr: Reset pin for MCU, active at low.

role.name: dW
role.descr: On-chip debug system uses a One-wire, bi-directional interface to control the program flow, execute AVR instructions in the CPU and to program the different non-volatile memories.

role.name: AIN0
role.descr: Analog Comparator Positive Input. When configured as an input and with the internal MOS pull-up resistor switched off, this pin also serves as the positive input of the on-chip Analog Comparator.

role.name: MOSI
role.descr: Data input pin for memory downloading or SPI.

role.name: OC0A
role.descr: Output compare matchA output: The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter0 output com-pareA. The pin has to be configured as an output to serve this function. The OC0A pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: AIN1
role.descr: Analog Comparator Negative Input. When configured as an input and with the internal MOS pull-up resistor switched off, this pin also serves as the negative input of the on-chip Analog Comparator.

role.name: MISO
role.descr: Data output pin for memory uploading or SPI.

role.name: INT0
role.descr: External Interrupt source 0 to the MCU.

role.name: OC0B
role.descr: Output compare matchB output. The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter0 output compareB. The pin has to be configured as an output to serve this function. The OC0B pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: SCK
role.descr: Clock input pin for memory up/downloading or SPI.
